channel.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]
channel.description:
[center][img width=800 height=300]http://i.imgur.com/Hpnb07w.png[/img][/center]
[center]Runescape Classic PVP Server[/center]
[center][url=http://www.DeathScape.org]www.DeathScape.org[/url][/center]
[center][code=Features] A server with world-wide PVP EXP Changer System(Similar to Stork) P2P w/ F2P Landscape 25x XP(30x w/ sub) Resizable Client Banks are safe zones Bank Portal System Customized Port Sarim SafeZone Shops "Master" Baker [/code][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/DdwUgYA.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/xWyKE7J.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/VAjJ3tW.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/eiC3cXl.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/eJdTmM2.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/xHmH8ua.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/w96u1AQ.png[/img][/center]
[center][img width=800 height=600]http://i.imgur.com/QzHwPR2.png[/img][/center]
[center]We will be making lots of adjustments to the game based on everyone's feedback, so feel free to post your suggestions on our forums[/center]

item.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

Our EXP Changer system has now been released.

Features:

- Can change the experience of a skill as long as you've already gained the experience in that skill
- Can [b]not[/b] change experience from one skill to another(attack to strength, etc)
- Must be logged out
- Must [b]not[/b] be in the the wilderness

This can be found up at the top of our website under Features > EXP Changer

Read full topic
item.source: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]

item.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]
item.dc:creator: @spermz spermz
item.description:
@spermz wrote:

tigerclan:

Refer to OP

I am pleased to announce that our 1st Deathscape Pking FFA Tournament will be hosted on the 8th of June at 3pm Eastern Time.

This Tournament will be Free For All, arena style last man standing.

Everything allowed except for God Mage Weapons.
Super Set Pots Allowed.
Sharks Allowed

The current requirements is that you must be under level 60 Combat for this Tournament. If you are over level 60 you may reduce your stats temporarily using our Exp Changer which will be released in the next few days.

Basically the Exp Changer reduces the stats to what level you require(While being logged off an outside the wilderness) allowing for flexible Pking builds without the need of having to level a pure. E.g if you have 60 Attack 60 Def and 60 Str you may change your stats to something like 60 attack 1 Def and 60 Str.

The Prize for this our first tournament is a Razer Deathadder 2013 Valued at over 60$

Please post on the forums if you interested in joining this awesome event. There will be many more of these to come!

Read full topic
item.source: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]

item.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]
item.dc:creator: @Congruent Congruent
item.description:
@Congruent wrote:

Caligula:

Only been playing for a few days, but it seems like it has the potential to be a great pvp server, just needs to get a bigger player base and then who knows what could happen from there. It may seem a little slow training, but it’s really not that bad (already 40 40 50 in about 30-45 mins of gameplay) and by talking to the baker in edgeville you can get an inventory full of food and that will make training go by a lot faster. Once the player base grows, this server will be great.

I tried it today. Pretty legit if enough players. The pk system is cool.

Read full topic
item.source: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]

item.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

Congruent:

The forum looks a lot better than the previous one. I keep getting a java error when opening the file, is there a webclient?

If you’re on windows you need to use the run.bat file to open the client. If you’re on *nix you need to use the run.sh shell prompt.

But to answer your question the webclient will be added very soon.

Read full topic

item.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

Yeah, so the new site is uploaded with Highscores and other features. We’re currently testing our EXP Changer system(similar to stork, but not exactly). It should be released sometime today.

The way it works is: You can change your experience points in a skill, but not across skills. Eg. You can’t AFK strength xp all day and then put it into prayer. You have to get the xp in the particular skill. Also if, say you lower a stat from… 50 to 20, and then gain the required experience to go from 50 to 51, then you’re stat will update to level 51. This is good because if the site goes down, you won’t be stuck at a lower level.

Read full topic
item.source: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]

item.title: DeathScape RSC PvP Server[1st PK tourney 2013/06/08]

I thought about joining but the forum looks so basic and hard to use.

Yes, well we are almost finished with our new site layout that has a lot more features(and is a lot cleaner). It’ll be released today.

I might give it a try then. We’ll see. Also, why is there a frowny face by this topic?
[/quote]

Lol, It’s an angry face(deathscape). This is a sad face -> :([/quote]

Pardon me, im not an expert in the field of emoticons.
